scenario_text.value: And why should I do that?

What do you mean why? Don’t tell me you’re
embarrassed!

(It’s Falcomon and Minoru. Sounds like
they’re talking about something.)

Please, do not misunderstand. I simply do not
see the point.
Can you explain it to me, Minoru?
Look, it’s simple, okay? Uh...

What’s up, Minoru? Are you two having a fight
or something?

Oh, Takuma! perfect timing! You’ve got to
help me with Falcomon!

Takuma, please, I don’t understand what
Minoru is saying.

And he won’t let it go. He wants me to call
out some sort of phrase in battle.
What is the point in doing that?
Oh, so that’s what’s going on. Let me see...
What should I say?
Don’t force Falcomon.
It gets you fired up.
It’s a human thing.

Minoru, I get it, but I don’t think you
should force Falcomon to do something.

And you’re probably a little embarrassed,
right, Falcomon?

No, I truly do not understand. Wouldn’t I be
leaving myself open by speaking?
Minoru, do you wish to die?
No, it’s not like that at all...

But you’re right, you would be wide open.
I didn’t think about that...
Well, it gets you fired up.

Yeah, what Takuma said! It’s all about
keeping those spirits up!

(Now Minoru’s latched on to my
explanation...)

So give it a try, okay? Please, please,
please, please, pleeease!

Well, if you want me to do it that badly.
Though I still do not understand.

I’m not sure how to put it. It’s a human
thing.
Or maybe just a Minoru thing.
But he’s not teasing you or anything.

Minoru is serious about this. At least
I think he is.
That I know. After all, our hearts are one.
I’m counting on you to do this, Falcomon!
Very well. I understand how you feel.

(Well, that’s settled. I wonder if Falcomon
is actually going to do it, though.)
